text: That's exactly what I was looking for thank you!

When using the richtext component within a module I am not seeing the option to make the content smart during editing.  The module I created is just a simple 2 column grid where the user can choose to put the image on the right or left of the rich text box.  Shouldn't the user still be able to make the richtext smart content?

Hey Jayme smart content is not supported in custom modules at the moment (this includes rich text modules inside of a custom module). This is currently on our ideas forum and marked as “In planning” you can view more here: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Enable-Smart-Content-on-Rich-Text-in-Custom-Modules/idi-p/11184>
Well, I guess I need to come up with some creative solutions to this.  It looks like there hasn't been much movement on this in a year. How likely is it that this would be addressed in the next year?
This is very helpful! Thanks  Tyler:v:
